title: Busted: A Memoir of Teenage Years
description: From author Phianna Rekab comes her deeply personal memoir of her teenage years, Busted. An American story of migrating from the Caribbean and growing up in Brooklyn, New York in the 1980s amidst the scourge of rampant sex, drugs, alcohol and how she found a way out of her poor neighborhood in search of her dream to become American.
author: Phianna Rekab
